content: An ActivityDefinition of "Collect vital signs" has child ActivityDefinitions of Collect blood pressure; Collect pulse rate, Collect oxygen saturation etc. For a given study what is meant by "Collect vital signs" is likely to vary, but I can't see a mechanism for ActivityDefinitions to have child ActivityDefinitions. Am I missing something?
Complex activities will generally be represented as PlanDefinitions. As soon as you have components, you need to think about what happens in series vs. parallel, what's mandatory vs. optional, etc.
